scripts.test:unit: python -m pytest tests/test_models.py tests/test_cache.py tests/test_routing.py tests/test_celery.py -v
scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:e2e
scripts.coverage: coverage run -m pytest tests/ && coverage report
scripts.coverage:html: coverage run -m pytest tests/ && coverage html
scripts.ci: npm run lint && npm run type-check && npm run coverage
